q1: Why is soccer called Football and Soccer in different countries?
a1: Football is the original international version while Americans call it soccer to differentiate from the NFL.
q2: Only in the USA and Canada is it known as soccer.  Around the globe there is football and American Football.  The better question is, why is American Football, called football, when it is played mostly with hands.
q3: Because the ball size is about a foot in length, thus Foot Ball.
a3: Football is more entertaining than american football
q4: I agree. American Football is boring. Too many pauses and more replays than actual action.
